level.name: material
level.description: The physical or tangible aspects, like tools or hardware.

level.name: empirical
level.description: Observable aspects, like test results or data collection.

level.name: syntactic
level.description: The structure or organization, such as source code or documents.

level.name: semantic
level.description: The meaning and purpose, like requirements or functions.

level.name: pragmatic
level.description: The practical use or application, like processes or workflows.

level.name: social
level.description: The social interactions and collaboration, such as teams or communication.
